remarks: Lemma for ~ prodmo .  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 4-Dec-2017.)
statement:
prodmo.1 $e |- F = ( k e. ZZ |-> if ( k e. A , B , 1 ) ) $.
prodmo.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> B e. CC ) $.
prodmo.3 $e |- G = ( j e. NN |-> [_ ( f ` j ) / k ]_ B ) $.
prodmolem3.4 $e |- H = ( j e. NN |-> [_ ( K ` j ) / k ]_ B ) $.
prodmolem3.5 $e |- ( ph -> ( M e. NN /\ N e. NN ) ) $.
prodmolem3.6 $e |- ( ph -> f : ( 1 ... M ) -1-1-onto-> A ) $.
prodmolem3.7 $e |- ( ph -> K : ( 1 ... N ) -1-1-onto-> A ) $.
prodmolem3 $p |- ( ph -> ( seq 1 ( x. , G ) ` M ) = ( seq 1 ( x. , H ) ` N ) ) $.
$d A k $.
$d B j $.
$d F k $.
$d G j $.
$d K j $.
$d M j $.
$d f j k $.
$d j k ph $.
